results.deck: Formerly known as Konami of Europe and Konami Limited, the European branch was renamed in April 2003. It was established in 1984 to distribute and market titles throughout Europe. While the headquarters is in Germany, other offices are located in England, Netherlands, France, and Spain.
results.name: Konami Digital Entertainment GmbH

game.name: Sunday vs. Magazine: Shuuketsu! Choujou Daikessen

concept.name: Video Game Characters That Play Video Games
